metadata.title: CVE-2016-7398 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A type confusion vulnerability in the merge_param() function ofphp_http_params.c in PHP's pecl-http extension 3.1.0beta2 (PHP 7) andearlier as well as 2.6.0beta2 (PHP 5) and earlier allows attackers to crashPHP and possibly execute arbitrary code via crafted HTTP requests.

criterions.comment: php-pecl-http package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
